channel.title: 【爱民如子·微服私访】床破乱入婚礼现场
channel.description: 【爱民如子·微服私访】床破乱入婚礼现场

item.title: 【爱民如子·微服私访】床破乱入婚礼现场[0-50]
item.description:
【爱民如子·微服私访】床破乱入婚礼现场 https://s2.ax1x.com/2019/07/23/eixs10.jpg
https://thehill.com/blogs/blog-briefing-room/news/454084-trump-crashes-wedding-reception-at-his-new-jersey-golf-club
President Trump made a surprise appearance at a wedding reception Saturday night that took place at his New Jersey golf club, prompting the bride, groom and attendees to break into chants of “USA! USA!”
大统领床破于上周六降临他在新泽西州的高尔夫俱乐部。引得新娘新郎宾客齐声呼喊USA！USA！
Video circulating on social media Sunday showed Trump walk out to the reception and the bride and groom rush over to join him. The crowd then erupted in the patriotic chant.
床破乱入婚礼现场，新郎新娘簇拥着他，齐声呼喊爱国口号的视频正在社交平台上传播。请看：https://twitter.com/24NewsBreak/status/1153063044009922560
Groom P.J. Mongelli later told CNN that Trump showing up at the wedding “was a complete and utter surprise.”
新郎官P.J. 萌钙利告诉CNN记者，称床破的现身是一个“巨大的惊喜”。
He said that he and his then-fiancée Nicole Marie Mongelli sent Trump multiple invitations to attend.
他称他和他的妻子妮可·玛丽·萌钙利向床破发了多封邀请函。
P.J. Mongelli said Trump first appeared during the cocktail hour to meet the bride and other family members before he made a second appearance at the reception at the request of the newlyweds.
P.J.称床破最初于鸡尾酒趴体时登场，会见了新娘和其他家庭成员。在新人请求之下又在之后的婚宴上隆重出席。
Not only are P.J. and Nicole Marie Mongelli big Trump supporters but they also got engaged at Trump’s golf club in Bedminster in 2017. The wedding also included MAGA-themed apparel and Trump flags.
P.J.和妮可都是川粉，他们2017年就是在这个俱乐部订婚。这场婚礼也进行了MAGA主题布置，包括MAGA服装和床破旗。
Trump spent the weekend at his New Jersey golf club and returned to Washington Sunday evening.
床破在这个俱乐部度过了周末，星期天晚上才回到白宫。
He has previously made an impromptu drop-in during a wedding in 2017 at the same club. Brochures for the Bedminster golf club also reportedly touted an appearance from Trump as a selling point in hosting an event there.
床破曾在2017年，于同一个俱乐部乱入过另一场婚礼。俱乐部的介绍手册中也特意标记了床破主题，并将其作为卖点来吸引公众于此举办活动。
item.content:encoded:
东非大裂谷:
【爱民如子·微服私访】床破乱入婚礼现场

https://thehill.com/blogs/blog-briefing-room/news/454084-trump-crashes-wedding-reception-at-his-new-jersey-golf-club
President Trump made a surprise appearance at a wedding reception Saturday night that took place at his New Jersey golf club, prompting the bride, groom and attendees to break into chants of “USA! USA!”
大统领床破于上周六降临他在新泽西州的高尔夫俱乐部。引得新娘新郎宾客齐声呼喊USA！USA！
Video circulating on social media Sunday showed Trump walk out to the reception and the bride and groom rush over to join him. The crowd then erupted in the patriotic chant.
床破乱入婚礼现场，新郎新娘簇拥着他，齐声呼喊爱国口号的视频正在社交平台上传播。请看：https://twitter.com/24NewsBreak/status/1153063044009922560
Groom P.J. Mongelli later told CNN that Trump showing up at the wedding “was a complete and utter surprise.”
新郎官P.J. 萌钙利告诉CNN记者，称床破的现身是一个“巨大的惊喜”。
He said that he and his then-fiancée Nicole Marie Mongelli sent Trump multiple invitations to attend.
他称他和他的妻子妮可·玛丽·萌钙利向床破发了多封邀请函。
P.J. Mongelli said Trump first appeared during the cocktail hour to meet the bride and other family members before he made a second appearance at the reception at the request of the newlyweds.
P.J.称床破最初于鸡尾酒趴体时登场，会见了新娘和其他家庭成员。在新人请求之下又在之后的婚宴上隆重出席。
Not only are P.J. and Nicole Marie Mongelli big Trump supporters but they also got engaged at Trump’s golf club in Bedminster in 2017. The wedding also included MAGA-themed apparel and Trump flags.
P.J.和妮可都是川粉，他们2017年就是在这个俱乐部订婚。这场婚礼也进行了MAGA主题布置，包括MAGA服装和床破旗。
Trump spent the weekend at his New Jersey golf club and returned to Washington Sunday evening.
床破在这个俱乐部度过了周末，星期天晚上才回到白宫。
He has previously made an impromptu drop-in during a wedding in 2017 at the same club. Brochures for the Bedminster golf club also reportedly touted an appearance from Trump as a selling point in hosting an event there.
床破曾在2017年，于同一个俱乐部乱入过另一场婚礼。俱乐部的介绍手册中也特意标记了床破主题，并将其作为卖点来吸引公众于此举办活动。

Grenadier:
新郎一脸的也能叫川粉吗

东非大裂谷:
Grenadier 发表于 2019-7-22 09:41

—— 来自 Google Pixel XL, Android 9上的 S1Next-鹅版 v2.1.0

sacodina:
我还以为美国也有闹洞房呢。
想想拍出川普微服私访记也行啊
博尔顿和蓬佩奥权当三德子和法印，然后带上梅拉尼娅或者伊万卡大公主。

wangxywd:

—— 来自 samsung SM-G9500, Android 8.0.0上的 S1Next-鹅版 v2.1.2
